javascript:alert('Watch%20Count%3A'%20%2B%20function%20getWatchCount()%7Bfunction%20e(e)%7Bvar%20o%3Dangular.element(e)%3Bo.hasClass(%22ng-isolate-scope%22)%26%26o.isolateScope%26%26a(o.isolateScope())%2Co.hasClass(%22ng-scope%22)%26%26a(o.scope())%7Dfunction%20a(e)%7Bn.hasOwnProperty(e.%24id)%7C%7C(n%5Be.%24id%5D%3D!0%2Ce.%24%24watchers%26%26(o%2B%3De.%24%24watchers.length))%7Dvar%20o%3D0%2Cn%3D%7B%7D%3Breturn%20angular.forEach(document.querySelectorAll(%22.ng-scope%20%2C%20.ng-isolate-scope%22)%2Ce)%2Co%7D())%3B
